variants.Description in input context: This variant results in an amino acid change (Arg197Cys) which may affect the function of the protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_006137.4:c.589C>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 85% on day 10.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 70% on day 10.
